author: rott
msg: handler chain pre and post invoker classes may need more than just the handler MessageContext.  Original commit for this function was in SVN rev 630273.

author: midon
msg: SOAP headers must be elements, but HTTP headers could be Text nodes: make header parts node friendly.

author: midon
msg: do not use stream!=null to check if body existence, this is error prone.

author: midon
msg: do not return too early when a message has no part. we meay need headers
